sourcesContent:
import '../App.css'; function Promotion22() { return(

Pobblebonk Promotion '22 Rules


COMEDIANS


1. HOW TO ENTER: Beginning on [START DATE] through December 31, 2022 (the “Promotion Period”), log-in to the Pobblebonk app using your Comedian account, and begin checking-in to open-mics.

2. ELIGIBILITY: Open to residents of states and countries where the app is available and 18 years of age and older as of [DATE PROMOTION BEGINS]. Void in countries where the app is not available and where otherwise prohibited.

3. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY: By entering this promotion, entrants waive all right to, and hold Pobblebonk, LLC harmless from, any claim, liability, loss, damage (including punitive, incidental, and consequential damages), or expense (including attorneys' fees) arising out of or in connection with participation in this promotion or the acceptance, use, or misuse of any prize.

4. WINNER SELECTION: Winners will be determined as follows:

 (a) Each registered check-in during the Promotion Period by an individual Comedian will be counted as one point and tallied to result in the “Check-In Total”.
 (b) Each unique mic check-in (a mic that was not previously checked-in by Comedian) during the Promotion Period by an individual Comedian will be calculated as follows: (5% of Check-Total) * (unique mic check-ins) = “Unique Mic Bonus”
 (c) The Check-In Total will be added to the Unique Mic Bonus to equal the “Promotion Score”
 (d) The Comedians with the top 3 Promotion Scores will be eligible for the prizes set forth below.
 (e) By way of example:
  (i) Comedian A: Checks into 10 mics.  All at the same mic (only 1 unique mic).
     (A) Their Check-In Total is 10. 
   (B) Their Unique Mic Bonus is (5% of 10 Check-In Total) * (1 unique mic check-in) = 0.5.
     (C) Their Promotion Score is 10 + 0.5 = 10.5
  (ii) Comedian B: Checks into 10 mics.  4 of the mics are unique mics.
   (A) Their Check-In Total is 10. 
   (B) Their Unique Mic Bonus is (5% of 10 Check-In Total) * (4 unique mic check-in) = 2.0.
     (C) Their Promotion Score is 10 + 2.0 = 12.0

5. PRIZES:
  1st Place – (i) $250.00 cash prize, (ii) photoshoot with the founder of Pobblebonk, LLC (with a single framed print included), and (iii) will be named “Most Active Comedian in the World 2022”
  2nd Place – $100 and a small customized trophy
  3rd Place – $50 and a small customized trophy

6. CHOICE OF LAW, FORUM, TERMS, AND PRIVACY: Entrant agrees that all matters arising out of or relating to this promotion are governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of Florida, without giving effect to any of its conflict of laws provisions thereof. Entrant further agrees that any legal suit, action, or proceeding arising out of or relating to this promotion shall be brought exclusively in the applicable federal or state courts located in Miami-Dade, Florida. This promotion is subject to and governed by the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.


FANS


1. HOW TO ENTER: Beginning on [START DATE] through December 31, 2022 (the “Promotion Period”), log-in to the Pobblebonk app using your Fan account, and begin checking-in to open-mics.

2. ELIGIBILITY: Open to residents of states and countries where the app is available and 18 years of age and older as of [DATE PROMOTION BEGINS]. Void in countries where the app is not available and where otherwise prohibited.

3. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY: By entering this promotion, entrants waive all right to, and hold Pobblebonk, LLC harmless from, any claim, liability, loss, damage (including punitive, incidental, and consequential damages), or expense (including attorneys' fees) arising out of or in connection with participation in this promotion or the acceptance, use, or misuse of any prize.

4. WINNER SELECTION: Winners will be determined as follows:
 (a) Each registered check-in during the Promotion Period by an individual Comedian will be counted as one point and tallied to result in the “Check-In Total”.
 (b) Each unique mic check-in (a mic that was not previously checked-in by Comedian) during the Promotion Period by an individual Fan will be calculated as follows: (5% of Check-Total) * (unique mic check-ins) = “Unique Mic Bonus”
 (c) The Check-In Total will be added to the Unique Mic Bonus to equal the “Promotion Score”
 (d) The Fans with the top 2 Promotion Scores will be eligible for the prizes set forth below.
 (e) By way of example:
  (i) Fan A: Checks into 10 mics.  All at the same mic (only 1 unique mic). 
   (A) Their Check-In Total is 10. 
   (B) Their Unique Mic Bonus is (5% of 10 Check-In Total) * (1 unique mic check-in) = 0.5. 
   (C) Their Promotion Score is 10 + 0.5 = 10.5
  (ii) Fan B: Checks into 10 mics.  4 of the mics are unique mics.
   (A) Their Check-In Total is 10. 
   (B) Their Unique Mic Bonus is (5% of 10 Check-In Total) * (4 unique mic check-in) = 2.0.
     (C) Their Promotion Score is 10 + 2.0 = 12.0

5. PRIZES: 1st Place – three pairs of tickets to see shows performed by comedians who are registered on the app (max ticket price of $20/ticket)
2nd Place – two pairs of tickets to see shows performed by comedians who are registered on the app (max ticket price of $20/ticket)
3rd Place - one pair of tickets to see shows performed by comedians who are registered on the app (max ticket price of $20/ticket)

6. CHOICE OF LAW, FORUM, TERMS, AND PRIVACY: Entrant agrees that all matters arising out of or relating to this promotion are governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of Florida, without giving effect to any of its conflict of laws provisions thereof. Entrant further agrees that any legal suit, action, or proceeding arising out of or relating to this promotion shall be brought exclusively in the applicable federal or state courts located in Miami-Dade, Florida. This promotion is subject to and governed by the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

); } export default Promotion22;
